meanings.definition: In a shamefaced manner; with a show of shame or embarrassment.
meanings.sent1: After spilling his drink at the party, he shamefacedly apologized to the host.
meanings.sent2: She shamefacedly admitted her mistake in front of the whole class.
meanings.sent3: The puppy shamefacedly chewed up the homework, knowing he was in trouble.
meanings.sent4: The student looked shamefacedly at his failed test, feeling embarrassed.
meanings.sent5: The toddler shamefacedly hid behind the curtain after breaking the vase.
